bibl.title: Rabbinic Law in its Roman and Near Eastern Context
bibl.note: Version remaniée d'une communication présentée au colloque "Rabbinic Law in its Roman and Near Eastern Context" qui s'est tenu au Trinity College de Dublin, 11-12 mars 2002. - S'appuie sur les P. Yadin et P. Nahal Hever.
COTTON Hannah M., "Diplomatics" or External Aspects of the Legal Documents from the Judaean Desert: Prolegomena.
Catherine HEZSER (Ed.), Rabbinic Law in its Roman and Near Eastern Context = Texte und Studien zum Antiken Judentum. 97 (Tübingen, 2003) pp. 49-61.
